description: This file defines interfaces and classes related to process container management in a C++ codebase, including iteration over network interfaces, memory and processor info, and container lifecycle management within the WPEFramework namespace.

classes.name: INetworkInterfaceIterator
classes.description: Interface for iterating over network interfaces, providing methods to retrieve interface name, address count, and specific addresses.

classes.name: IMemoryInfo
classes.description: Interface providing memory usage statistics of a container (allocated, resident, shared).

classes.name: IProcessorInfo
classes.description: Interface providing CPU usage statistics of a container, including total usage and per-core usage.

classes.name: IContainerIterator
classes.description: Iterator interface to enumerate containers by ID.

classes.name: IContainer
classes.description: Interface representing a container with methods to retrieve ID, PID, memory, CPU info, network interfaces, status, and control start/stop operations.

classes.name: IContainerAdministrator
classes.description: Singleton interface for managing container instances, including creation, retrieval, and logging configuration.

methods.name: Container
methods.description: Creates a new container instance with specified ID, search paths, log path, and configuration.

methods.name: Logging
methods.description: Enables logging for the container framework with specified log path and options.

methods.name: Containers
methods.description: Returns an iterator over all created containers.

methods.name: Get
methods.description: Retrieves a specific container by its ID.

ctags.name: IContainerIterator
ctags.pattern: /^    class IContainerIterator : public Core::IIterator, public Core::IReferenceCounted {$/

ctags.name: INetworkInterfaceIterator
ctags.pattern: /^    class INetworkInterfaceIterator : public Core::IIterator,  public Core::IReferenceCounted  {$/
